project.name: C-C401A-WIRE-06-ST01-DT02-DF15-CF24-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C401A-WIRE-06-ST01-DT02-DF15-CF24-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Long input will cause a lot of memory to be allocated and if it is an odd length, the program won't properly free the allocatedmemory causing a memory leak.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
